mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.user_email AS orderUserEmail, o.user_name AS orderUserName, o.user_address AS orderUserAddress, o.created_at AS orderDateTime, m.name AS menuName, om.quantity AS quantity, m.price AS price, o.status AS status FROM orders o LEFT JOIN ordered_menu om ON o.id = om.order_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON om.menu_id = m.id WHERE o.created_at BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} ORDER BY o.user_email, o.created_at
